column4: anyone have experience getting music off an ipod touch?  i can mount it... and i read the files are in ipod_control/music ... but can i just copy all these # name folders... then clear the ipod touch... and move the files back?
yeah, lucid... i tried gtkpod but it wouldn't work
gtkpod used to work with my ipod though, but this is an ipod touch
but not the latest ubuntu, with 12.04 you'll have better chances to work with latest iOS
but again, everytime iOS updates, ubuntu support is broken, it's a never ending story
the fastest way would be a fresh install
because you are using an old ubuntu release as i told you already
don't come at me with the old release stuff, people have been putting mp3s on apple products for a long time
yeah, everytime there is a new ubuntu release it supports the current iOS, then a new iOS version is releases and the support is broken...is a never ending story
